qas.question: Where is there little variation in the length of day throughout the year?
Why does altitudinal migration occur in some tropical birds?

answers.text: to obtain more of their preferred foods

qas.question: What are tropical birds preferred foods?
Where is it always warm enough for food supply?

context: <a0_0><a3_0>In the tropics<a3_0/><a0_0/> there is little variation in the length of day throughout the year, and it is always warm enough for a food supply, but altitudinal migration occurs in some tropical birds. There is evidence that this enables the migrants <a1_0>to obtain more of their preferred foods<a1_0/> such as <a2_0>fruits<a2_0/>.
